course.subject: RMBI
course.name: Academic and Professional Development in Risk Management and Business Intelligence
course.description: This course is designed to provide academic advising to students throughout their studies in the RMBI program, to enhance their understanding of the industries relevant to Risk Management and Business Intelligence and the related techniques expected by the market. Students are required to attend seminars and discussion sessions. For RMBI students only. Graded P/PP/F.
